pages.text: • If you are coming here from modded 1.7.10, remember that modded Minecraft 1.12.2 is different than 1.7.10. Performance is different too.$(br)• Whenever you generate a new world, remember to allow it some time to load the new chunks. This also applies$(br)to new dimensisons.$(br)This will greatly improve your FPS and game experience.

$(l)RAM and JVM Args$()$(br2)• It is recommended that 6 GB of RAM will be allocated to the pack for normal play (unless you are using custom JVM Args, which would help with RAM usage).$(br)• Consider adding JVM arguments into the Java Args box of the launcher settings. This can help especially 8 GB RAM machines and increase performance drastically for some users. Experimental JVM arguments to the modpack can be found through $(l:https://pastebin.com/LKtYh9k1)this$() link.
